body: The NTR deniers crawling out of the woodwork with the usual excuses. No existing relationship, no cheating, doesn't follow a loosely translated definition of netorare. NTR is a genre. A doujinshi scenario doesn't have to conform to your personal wife/girlfriend stealing cuck fantasies to be considered NTR.
This ain’t NTR. There was no indication the narrator had feelings for her.
Cheating and ntr are two separate tags if it tells you fucktard anything
How the fuck is this and NTR? you fuckers haven't seen a real one yet?
Fuck yea!!! SSS Tier. Sex video getting shown to the whole school? That's tough!  🤪

I knew a friend In real life who was pressured into dating this guy by the group of "popular girls" in middle school and she kept getting hounded by them for a week till she cried because her friend group also started hounding her w it. Idrk what happened to her tho
Ntr only needs the MC to have something stolen from him even if it was never his to begin with, if he feels like it was stolen than the feeling of having something stolen still takes place

For the language challenged. If there’s enough of you lonely fuckheads calling/tagging Non-NTR NTR. Then it’s going to unironically become NTR. Just like how the word “literally” literally doesn’t mean literally anymore. You can’t steal someone through the act of fucking if the stolen person wasn’t yours to begin with..
Well, my guy lost the battle but not the war
1 day, the normals of nhentai will know what ntr means. One day they’ll realize it’s purely emotional on the side of a mc.
I pretty sure girl in real life is not that dumb
For those asking if it's NTR, try to understand that the main characters of netorare doujinshi don't need to be married or going out for a story to be considered NTR. Think outside the box
How do you get NTR’d when that’s not even your girl?
It can't be helped... Just find another girl

Let's be real though, while shy youth does exist for smart individuals like this girl (at least it's portrayed with the studying away from everyone) peer pressure who probably work on this girl, however I think being convinced to fuck a few days into a relationship, for someone who's probably smart enough to know the risks, over thinks shyly about the smallest thing (i.e possible layer regret) this is only half of the way realistic. So this what happens when you dont shot your shoot bois
how is this NTR?

@king1919djdj what u talking about? this is realistic compared to most ntr. There are passive people that just can’t say NO and let things happen to them. This is usually the result of lonely/very strict upbringing forcing those kids find joy in pleasing others.
So does the narrator even care? If not, then this is pretty accurate. People start and end sexual relationships all the time in school. No one really cares especially once you start college.
is this really NTR though?  Seems like they were only just friends and nothing more than that.

I like the term of thinking it would be vanilla wholesome but it turns out to be ntr shit as "NTrapped"
Has that exist before?

@king1919djdj usually NTR have stupid and impossible plot, but this one? This is pretty common, and i've seen it a lot IRL. A shy girl being pressured into a relationship with someone, and then being forced to do something she eventually regret due to her being uncapable of saying "no".
